name: Whole's End
description:
Team Name: BarKeepers

Controls:

Leftclick - Interact with Items

Rightclick - Change between rotation and moving move

Press Middle Mouse Button - Change rotation axis

Scroll Mouse Wheel - Move object or rotate it

Gameplay

Drag objects into the mixer at the bar, find recipes and serve your customers! But beware, depending on the recipe the customers might not survive the night.. as their heads might grow!

You can also break glasses and spill fluids, of course.

Assets that were not made during the GameJam

  • MonitorScreen Material from Blueprints Project under the learning section
  • GuestCharacter animations and rigging from Mixamo.com
  • Sounds from Soundly
  • Cubemap made with SpacesScape
  • WaterMaterial from Unreal Wiki - Water test project
  • Substances
  • GameTextures.com 3 Freebies for this month
  • One music track: https://richarpkmusic.weebly.com/
